properties.name: 75th St. Brewery
properties.description: Posted by Momisery75th St. BreweryMy local neighborhood brewery, where we spend a good amount of time. They have excellent food (3 varities of fish and chips, which are legendary) and a decent selection of home made brews. Currie likes it because the bartenders give her free drinks, I like it because it\'s close enough to walk home

properties.name: America's Pub
properties.description: Posted by Momisery510 westport rd kansas city I was young, and I didn\'t know any better.

properties.name: Fin's Waldo Bar
properties.description: Posted by Momisery7438 Wornall kansas city mo 64114The neighborhood dive bar. Great for when they have that terrible live music at 75th st.

properties.name: Kennedy's
properties.description: Posted by MomiseryThe nieghborhood college bar. Goldentee, collars flipped up, budlight. Sad but true

properties.name: McCoy's
properties.description: Posted by Momisery4057 Pennsylvania Ave kansas cityThe nicest bar in Westport, very popular amoung that mainstream mid-twenties set.

properties.name: Stanford and Sons Comedy Club
properties.description: Posted by MomiseryThis is where it all started, the first bar I was ever served at. It was a comedy club upstairs and a bar/club downstaris. I got in through frineds of the doorman on St. Paddy\'s day 1996. Unfortunately, it\'s now under new ownership and totally remodeled, so I never got a chance to go back and sit on that same bar stool once legal.

properties.name: The Beaumont
properties.description: Posted by Momisery4050 pennsylvania kansas cityA country bar. I\'ve been there too many time to count, I used to run with that crowd a little, and fell for a girl who rode the mechanical bull.

properties.name: The Brick
properties.description: Posted by Momisery1727 Mcgee St kansas city moArguably the center of Kansas City\'s local rock scene, this bar is what you\'d expect: hipsters, stiff drinks and an overpowering sound system. I hear that Sunday night emo karaoke is the best in town.

properties.name: The Hurricane
properties.description: Posted by Momisery4048 broadway kansas cityTHE kansas city rock bar. Saw the killers here with about 100 other people.

properties.name: The News Room
properties.description: Posted by Momisery3704 broadway kansas cityA 2am dive bar, decorated with vintage type writers strewn about. A couple of pool tables draw the shark set, though this is a hipster stronghold.

properties.name: Westport Beach Club
properties.description: Posted by Momisery
